title: Illaoi is going to be a bronze stomper...
body: calling it now. bump this thread once I'm right.

replies.body: I could play toplane/mid Janna/Sona and stomp bronze players. Its not hard.
No you couldnt, with Sona, maybe, but not Janna.
Lol k maybe if youre up against a mordekaiser
I don't think you realise how bad bronze players are.
Nah all anyone needs to do is read what her abilities do, no sweat
Yeah I'll give you that one.
Basically every champion in this game can stomp bronzies, what is your point?

I'm talking about the elite tier of bronze-stompers.

eg. {{champion:7}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:92}}
